meta.title: List group
meta.description: List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content. List group items can be modified to support just about any content within. They can also be used as navigation via various props.

props.description: When set, renders a flush list group with no left and right borders
When set, renders the list-group horizontally rather than the default of vertical
When true renders the list-group-item as a button element
When set, give the item the appearance of having an action. Not needed when props 'to', 'href' or 'button' are used
